title: [Gyldemar Forest, Clearing]
description: A single oak tree stands at each of the cardinal directions around the clearing.  A ring of short bushes fills the gaps between the trees around the clearing's edge.  Centered in the clearing is a moss-covered stone.  Around the stone, a ring of curved bricks forms a circle.

A single oak tree stands at each of the cardinal directions around the clearing.  A ring of short bushes fills the gaps between the trees around the clearing's edge.  Centered in the clearing is moss-covered stone, illuminated by pale moon glow.  Around the stone, a ring of curved bricks forms a circle.
